+Christian C AIDS is when the immune system is compromised. HIV can be 
treated effectively and patients may survive. AIDS is almost certainly a 
death sentence. Many people die from AIDS because they don't not even know 
the HIV virus is inside them. For a period of [usually] about 3-10 years 
there are no symptoms. When first contracted, many experience flu-like 
symptoms. After the 3-10 year period, it is often too late for patients to 
recover.

he's been a racist (and a pretty shitty person in general) his entire life.

his interview with Cooper, I can't get behind the "let's crucify Sterling" 
movement. The man is a shell of a human being. He's a scared, confused, 
miserable old man who occasionally gets his shit together long enough to 
say something offensive. 

His termination from the league shouldn't be seen as "We got that bastard 
Sterling", but as a message to current/future NBA owners and to those in 
power throughout society that racism is not acceptable-no matter how much 
money and influence you have. Sterling needed to be exposed decades ago, at 
this point people are just beating up on a senile old man who no longer has 
the capacity to learn/understand why the things he has done are wrong.﻿
